metadata.description: Wave 1: High-value media works featuring orphan historical figures. Focus on popular biographical films, historical TV series, plays, and documentaries to maximize portrayal connections and close gap toward beta targets (400 MediaWorks, 681 portrayals).

works.title: Oppenheimer
works.creator: Christopher Nolan
works.description: Epic biographical thriller about J. Robert Oppenheimer and the Manhattan Project, exploring the development of the atomic bomb during WWII.

works.title: The Imitation Game
works.creator: Morten Tyldum
works.description: Biographical thriller about mathematician Alan Turing's efforts to decrypt German intelligence codes during World War II.

works.title: Hamilton
works.creator: Lin-Manuel Miranda
works.description: Revolutionary sung-and-rapped-through musical chronicling Alexander Hamilton's rise from Caribbean immigrant to Founding Father.

works.title: The Crown
works.creator: Peter Morgan
works.description: Historical drama depicting the reign of Queen Elizabeth II from her wedding to the present day, spanning political upheavals and personal challenges.

works.title: Vikings
works.creator: Michael Hirst
works.description: Historical drama following the legendary Norse hero Ragnar Lothbrok and his descendants as they raid and explore new territories.

works.title: The Last Kingdom
works.creator: Stephen Butchard
works.description: Historical drama based on Bernard Cornwell's Saxon Stories, following the Viking invasions of England and Alfred the Great's defense of Wessex.

works.title: Napoleon
works.creator: Ridley Scott
works.description: Epic historical war film chronicling Napoleon Bonaparte's rise to power, military campaigns, and turbulent relationship with Josephine.

works.title: Lincoln
works.creator: Steven Spielberg
works.description: Historical drama focusing on the final four months of Abraham Lincoln's life and his efforts to abolish slavery through the 13th Amendment.

works.title: Amadeus
works.creator: Milos Forman
works.description: Period drama exploring the fictionalized rivalry between composers Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and Antonio Salieri in 18th-century Vienna.

works.title: A Beautiful Mind
works.creator: Ron Howard
works.description: Biographical drama about mathematician John Nash, his groundbreaking work in game theory, and his struggle with schizophrenia.

works.title: The Theory of Everything
works.creator: James Marsh
works.description: Biographical drama depicting the life of theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking and his relationship with his first wife Jane.

works.title: Gandhi
works.creator: Richard Attenborough
works.description: Epic biographical film chronicling Mahatma Gandhi's life from his early activism in South Africa to India's independence movement.

works.title: Troy
works.creator: Wolfgang Petersen
works.description: Epic historical action film loosely based on Homer's Iliad, depicting the Trojan War and the legendary heroes who fought in it.
works.setting: Ancient Greece and Troy, circa 1200 BCE

works.title: Alexander
works.creator: Oliver Stone
works.description: Epic historical drama chronicling the life of Alexander the Great, from his education under Aristotle to his vast conquests.

works.title: Braveheart
works.creator: Mel Gibson
works.description: Epic war film depicting William Wallace's leadership in the First War of Scottish Independence against King Edward I of England.

works.title: Lawrence of Arabia
works.creator: David Lean
works.description: Epic biographical adventure film chronicling T.E. Lawrence's experiences in the Ottoman Empire during World War I.

works.title: Elizabeth
works.creator: Shekhar Kapur
works.description: Historical drama depicting Elizabeth I's transformation from vulnerable young woman to England's Virgin Queen.

works.title: The Favourite
works.creator: Yorgos Lanthimos
works.description: Period dark comedy exploring the power dynamics between Queen Anne and two women vying for her favor in early 18th-century England.

works.title: Mary Queen of Scots
works.creator: Josie Rourke
works.description: Historical drama exploring the turbulent life and rivalry between Mary Stuart and her cousin Elizabeth I.

works.title: Downfall
works.creator: Oliver Hirschbiegel
works.description: Historical war drama depicting the final days of Adolf Hitler and the Nazi regime during the Battle of Berlin in 1945.

works.title: John Adams
works.creator: Tom Hooper
works.description: Historical miniseries chronicling the life of America's second president from the Boston Massacre to his retirement.

works.title: Chernobyl
works.creator: Craig Mazin
works.description: Historical drama miniseries depicting the 1986 Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the heroic cleanup efforts that followed.

works.title: The Borgias
works.creator: Neil Jordan
works.description: Historical drama chronicling the corrupt and powerful Borgia family during the Italian Renaissance under Pope Alexander VI.

works.title: Medici
works.creator: Nicholas Meyer
works.description: Historical drama depicting the rise of the Medici family as they became the most powerful banking dynasty in Renaissance Florence.

works.title: The King
works.creator: David Michod
works.description: Historical drama based on Shakespeare's Henriad, depicting the transformation of Prince Hal into King Henry V of England.

works.title: Julius Caesar
works.creator: William Shakespeare
works.description: Historical tragedy depicting the conspiracy against Julius Caesar, his assassination, and its aftermath in Republican Rome.

works.title: Henry V
works.creator: William Shakespeare
works.description: Historical play chronicling King Henry V's military campaign in France, culminating in the Battle of Agincourt.

works.title: Richard III
works.creator: William Shakespeare
works.description: Historical tragedy depicting Richard III's Machiavellian rise to power and brief reign as King of England.

works.title: Antony and Cleopatra
works.creator: William Shakespeare
works.description: Historical tragedy exploring the doomed love affair between Mark Antony and Cleopatra during the Roman civil wars.

works.title: The Crucible
works.creator: Arthur Miller
works.description: Historical drama depicting the Salem witch trials of 1692, written as an allegory for McCarthyism.

works.title: A Man for All Seasons
works.creator: Robert Bolt
works.description: Historical drama chronicling Sir Thomas More's refusal to endorse King Henry VIII's separation from the Catholic Church.

works.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
works.creator: Shekhar Kapur
works.description: Historical drama sequel depicting Elizabeth I's later reign, focusing on the Spanish Armada and her relationship with Sir Walter Raleigh.

works.title: 13th
works.creator: Ava DuVernay
works.description: Documentary exploring the intersection of race, justice, and mass incarceration in the United States through the lens of the 13th Amendment.

works.title: Apollo 11
works.creator: Todd Douglas Miller
works.description: Documentary using archival footage to chronicle the 1969 Apollo 11 mission that successfully landed the first humans on the Moon.

works.title: They Shall Not Grow Old
works.creator: Peter Jackson
works.description: Documentary using restored and colorized WWI footage from the Imperial War Museum to bring the experiences of soldiers to life.

works.title: The Social Network
works.creator: David Fincher
works.description: Biographical drama depicting the founding of Facebook and the legal battles surrounding Mark Zuckerberg's creation.

works.title: Steve Jobs
works.creator: Danny Boyle
works.description: Biographical drama structured around three product launches that defined Steve Jobs's career at Apple.

works.title: Schindler's List
works.creator: Steven Spielberg
works.description: Epic historical drama depicting Oskar Schindler's efforts to save over a thousand Polish-Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

works.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
works.creator: Bryan Singer
works.description: Biographical musical drama chronicling the life of Freddie Mercury and the rise of Queen from 1970 to their Live Aid performance.

works.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
works.creator: Andrew Dominik
works.description: Western drama depicting the final months of outlaw Jesse James and his eventual betrayal and murder by Robert Ford.

works.title: Milk
works.creator: Gus Van Sant
works.description: Biographical drama about Harvey Milk, one of the first openly gay elected officials in the U.S., and his fight for LGBTQ rights.

works.title: Selma
works.creator: Ava DuVernay
works.description: Historical drama depicting Martin Luther King Jr.'s 1965 voting rights marches from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama.

works.title: Spotlight
works.creator: Tom McCarthy
works.description: Biographical drama about The Boston Globe's investigation into widespread child sexual abuse by Catholic priests.

works.title: The King's Speech
works.creator: Tom Hooper
works.description: Historical drama depicting King George VI's struggle to overcome his stammer with the help of speech therapist Lionel Logue.

works.title: 12 Years a Slave
works.creator: Steve McQueen
works.description: Historical drama based on Solomon Northup's memoir about his kidnapping and enslavement in the antebellum South.

works.title: The Great
works.creator: Tony McNamara
works.description: Satirical historical comedy-drama depicting Catherine the Great's rise to power in 18th-century Russia.

works.title: Band of Brothers
works.creator: Tom Hanks
works.description: War drama miniseries following Easy Company of the 101st Airborne Division through the European Theater of WWII.

works.title: The Pacific
works.creator: Tom Hanks
works.description: War drama miniseries chronicling the experiences of U.S. Marines fighting in the Pacific Theater during WWII.

works.title: The Tudors
works.creator: Michael Hirst
works.description: Historical drama depicting the reign of King Henry VIII, his six marriages, and the English Reformation.

works.title: Rome
works.creator: John Milius
works.description: Historical drama depicting the transformation of Rome from Republic to Empire through the eyes of two soldiers.

works.title: Masters of the Air
works.creator: John Orloff
works.description: War drama miniseries following the Eighth Air Force's bomber crews as they conduct dangerous missions over Nazi Germany.
